recommended_degree: Psikologi, Teknologi Pendidikan, Ilmu Komunikasi, Manajemen Sumber Daya Manusia (Sarjana)
job_description:
Responsibilities:
The Learning Design Intern will help create and improve learning materials such as slides, modules, worksheets, handouts, and simple visual assets. The intern will conduct basic research to support content development, update existing training materials based on feedback, and ensure all content stays accurate and well organized. They will also be responsible for maintaining files and documentation related to learning materials.

Qualifications:
This role is suitable for fresh graduates  HR, Psychology, Communication, Educational Technology or related fields. Candidates should be able to design clear and engaging materials using Canva or presentation tools, and have good attention to detail, creativity, and basic research skills. Strong communication, willingness to learn, the ability to work independently, and readiness to commit full-time to the apprenticeship program are essential. Having a personal laptop to support work activities is required for this internship
